item.title: Wireless router problem and an unexpected way to solve it.
item.description: A lil’ bit nerdy here. So if anyone does not like all that computer stuff skip to the LAST LINE. The trouble. It all started when I bought my first wireless router D-Link DIR 320. It looked fine. Started working in seconds and was pretty easy to configure. I was really happy but the I suddenly saw that I can’t reach my favorite finance site. Sites may be down, I thought.
